original_text: The animals going in were male and female of every living thing, as God had commanded Noah. Then the Lord shut him in.
korean_text: 들어간 것들은 모든 것의 암수라 하나님이 그에게 명하신 대로 들어가매 여호와께서 그를 들여보내고 문을 닫으시니라

sentences.original_text: The animals going in were male and female
Then the Lord shut him in
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주님께서 그를 안에 넣고 문을 닫으셨다
